Job Description:
Magento developer 

Requirements 

Atleast 2 years of Magento experience with strong E- commerce background. Work alongside leadership team to determine future strategy and implementation of new tools and e- Commerce innovation. Understanding of business requirements and the process of translating them into well- engineered and integrated technical solutions. Leading the technology team and ensure that they adhere to best coding practices,  methodologies,  implementation processes,  quality and standards. Should be able to strongly provide recommendations based on business problems. Diagnose and solve technical problems. Optimize platform speed/ performance,  redis /  memcahe and CDN implementation. Up to date with the latest web trends. 

Location : Banglore 

Please send across your CV to career@sports365.in /  hr@sports365.in with subject line Magento Developer.
